scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.json && cp src/server/index.html dist/server/index.html && cp src/server/rts.html dist/server/rts.html && mkdir -p dist/server/rts-sprites && cp -R src/server/rts-sprites/. dist/server/rts-sprites/ && chmod +x dist/cli/cli.js
scripts.test:e2e:rts: npm run build && node --test --experimental-strip-types tests/rts-building-palette.e2e.test.ts tests/rts-base-existing-repo.e2e.test.ts tests/rts-layout-non-destructive-persistence.e2e.test.ts tests/rts-refresh-disconnected-entities-persistence.e2e.test.ts
